title: Making a Classic Espresso
content: 1. Grind your beans to a fine setting. 2. Tamp firmly. 3. Brew under 9 bar for ~25 seconds. 4. Serve immediately.

title: Introduction to Latte Art
content: 1. Steam milk to 60 Â°C with microfoam. 2. Pour in slow circles. 3. Finish with a controlled wiggle.
